blogPost.excerpt: Gumdrop is a matchmaking community that values more than just looks. Go beyond text & pictures and discover people you vibe with on more than just a surface level. Come join the invite-only matchmaking movement. After all, it's who you are that counts.
blogPost.body: Gumdrop is a matchmaking community that values more than just looks. Go beyond text & pictures and discover people you vibe with on more than just a surface level. Come join the invite-only matchmaking movement. After all, it's who you are that counts.
blogPost.title: Gumdrop - Find your happy match.
blogPost.author: Gilbert

localize.description: 口香糖是一个相亲社区，它看重的不仅仅是外表。超越文字和图片，发现你与之共鸣的人，而不仅仅是表面上的。来加入仅限受邀参加的婚介活动吧。毕竟，你是谁才是最重要的。
口香糖是一個相親社區，它看重的不僅僅是外表。超越文字和圖片，發現你與之共鳴的人，而不僅僅是表面上的。來加入僅限受邀參加的婚介活動吧。畢竟，你是誰纔是最重要的。

previous.excerpt: Tunnels is a text-based "Choose-your-own-ending" game set in a world post-apocalypse. --- It contains: - 21 hand-drawn illustrations - 9 main story endings - 3 unlockable side stories, each with 3 different endings --- Collect them all!
previous.title: Tunnels - An apocalyptic choose-your-own-ending game

localize.description: 隧道是一款以文本为基础的“选择你自己的结局”的游戏，背景设定在世界末日之后的世界。-它包含：-21幅手绘插图-9个主要故事结尾-3个可解锁的次要故事，每个故事有3个不同的结局-收集它们！
localize.tagline: 一场末日般的自主选择结局的游戏

localize.description: 隧道是一款以文本爲基礎的“選擇你自己的結局”的遊戲，背景設定在世界末日之後的世界。-它包含：-21幅手繪插圖-9個主要故事結尾-3個可解鎖的次要故事，每個故事有3個不同的結局-收集它們！
localize.tagline: 一場末日般的自主選擇結局的遊戲

next.excerpt: Calculate a website’s environmental impact, see the breakdown and learn what measures can be taken to improve it.
next.title: Beacon - Calculate a webpages footprint what you can do to about it.

localize.description: 计算网站对环境的影响，查看故障，并了解可以采取哪些措施来改善它。
localize.tagline: 计算网页足迹，您可以为此做些什么。

localize.description: 計算網站對環境的影響，查看故障，並瞭解可以採取哪些措施來改善它。
localize.tagline: 計算網頁足跡，您可以爲此做些什麼。
